name.ja: <ruby>星辰竜<rt>ドラゴンテイル</rt></ruby>ウルグラ

text.en: If this card is sent to the GY as material for a Fusion Summon: You can Set 1 "Dragon Tale" Spell/Trap from your Deck, then you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap on the field. If this card is in your GY: You can target 1 Spellcaster "Dragon Tale" monster in your GY; place this card on the bottom of the Deck, and if you do, add that monster to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Dragon Tale Ulgra" once per turn.
